column2: Traffic;Phnom Penh (Post News):------ Chinese man  drunk driving flipped his car
column3: but fortunately did not cause any injuries.------The incident occurred at 12:30 am  on Saturday
column6: inf Chom Chao.------According to a source from the scene
column8: a drunken Chinese man was seen driving at speed
column9: when he hit the central reservation and flipped
column10: dragging along for about 10 meters.------After the incident
column11: the local authority cooperated with the cops to measure the scene and take the car to be kept at the Phnom Penh Road Traffic Police Station for resolution.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/366553------https://youtu.be/xdt1dyNYo0c
